long_description: This Gerber Bear Grylls Ultimate knife is the fine-edge update of the Bear Grylls series favorite. Designed with input from Bear himself, this blade features innovations not found on other knives. Fine-edge blade is made of high carbon stainless steel for excellent edge retention. Textured rubber handle offers a secure, comfortable grip; lanyard cord features an integrated emergency whistle. Stainless-steel pommel at the base of the handle is perfect for hammering. The Gerber Bear Grylls Ultimate knife features a rugged nylon and rubber sheath that houses a knife sharpener, fire starter and survival guide.
short_description: This Gerber Bear Grylls Ultimate knife is the fine-edge update of the Bear Grylls series favorite. Designed with input from Bear himself, this blade features innovations not found on other knives.
